summary: Set in late-19th-century Russia high-society, the aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the affluent and handsome Count Vronsky. Tolstoy's novel adaptation.
cast: Stasys Baltakis|Ilja Bereznickas|Diana Birenyte|Léa Bosco|Santiago Cabrera|María Castro|Edgaras Cerniauskas|Paulius Cinauskas|Lou de Laâge|Sergio Ercolessi|Dainius Jankauskas|Kestutis Macijauskas|Darius Miniotas|Ángela Molina|Carlotta Natoli|Dylan Pierce|Emanuela Postacchini|Vittoria Puccini|Karolina Reciugaite|Sydne Rome|Benjamin Sadler|Pietro Sermonti|Kamile Sidarovaite|Donatas Simukauskas|Sam Lucas Smith|Gediminas Storpirstis|Karina Stungyte|James Tratas|Sakalas Uzdavinys|Annemarie van de Mond|Jonas Verseckas|Patricia Vico|Max von Thun
